      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int CustomerService.createNewCustomer(Customer cust)
      Creates a new customer in the database by writing customer information to the customers table, login credentials to the credentials table, and account information to the customer_accounts table and customer_transactions table

      Inserts customer accounts into the customer_accounts table for a new customer

      Writes login credentials to database for a new customer

      Retrieves customer account balances by customerId

      Updates the email address and phone number for a customer
      int DataService.dbUpdateCustomerCredentials(Customer cust)
      Updates the login credentials for a customer
      int CustomerService.deleteExistingCustomer(Customer cust)
      Deletes an existing customer completely from the database
      int BankService.doCheckingOverdraft(Customer cust)
      Writes an overdraft transaction to the database
      int BankService.doTransaction(Customer cust, java.lang.String accountType, int transType, double amount)
      Executes a deposit or withdrawal from any of the three account types (Checking, Saving, or Loan)
      int BankService.doTransfer(Customer cust, java.lang.String fromAccount, double amount, java.lang.String toAccount)
      Executes a transfer between two accounts
      int CustomerService.updateExistingCustomer(Customer cust)
      Updates an existing customer in the database by writing customer information to the customers table and login credentials to the credentials table.
      boolean BankService.validateCashAdvancePayment(Customer cust, double amount)
      Validates the business rule that cash advance payments (deposits) must be less than the outstanding balance
      boolean BankService.validateWithdrawal(Customer cust, java.lang.String accountType, double amount)
      Validates a withdrawal amount against the balance of record from the database by account type
